Pinpoint Targeting: Ranged attack ignores armor bonus

Smite Evil: May gain +3 attack, +10 HP damage, bypass DR, and +3 AC vs. chosen evil foe (+20 HP on first hit vs. outsider, dragon, or undead) 4/dy

Aura Of Resolve: Immune to charm/R10' Allies gain +4 vs. charm
Divine Health: Immune to disease
Endurance: +4 extended physical action
Evasion: Reflex save in light or no armor yields no damage instead of half
Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 3; P2: 2; P3: 1; R1: 2; R2: 1; R3: 0 Spell DC: P: 13; R: 10
Spells:
Allfood (R2 Tran): Transforms touched 35 lb object into 1 day's food for 35 Medium creatures
Arrow Eruption (R2 Conj): R680' Duplicates of arrow that killed in prior rd attack 7 foes in 30' radius
Aura Of Greater Courage (P2 Abju): Allies in 10' radius gain immunity to fear for 70 min
Bestow Grace (P2 Abju): Touched good creature adds its charisma bonus to saves for 7 min
Blaze Of Glory (P4 Conj): 30' radius restores 3d6 HP to good creatures, inflicts 3d6 HP on evil (DC 17 Will half), gives +1 attack, damage, save, and skill to allies and -1 to foes for 7 rd; self drops to -1 HP and stabilizes
Bow Spirit (R4 Conj): Conjured spirit attacks using self ammo, bonuses, and feats each rd for 7 rd
Challenge Evil (P1 Ench): R40' Evil target must attack self or suffer sickened (DC 14 Will neg) and self gains +2 melee attack on target for 7 min
Chameleon Stride (R2 Illu): Self gains +4 Stealth and 20% miss from non-adjacent foes for 7 min
Detect Evil (Detect Evil1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on evil auras for conc or 100 min
Divine Transfer (P3 Necr): Touched regains up to 15 HP, transferred from self, and gains DR 3/evil for 7 rd
Fire Of Entanglement (P2 Evoc): Target of next Smite Evil hit suffers entanglement for 7 rd (DC 15 Ref 1 rd)
Fire Of Judgment (P3 Evoc): Target of next Smite Evil hit suffers 1d6 HP divine (1d10 HP on outsider, dragon, or undead), bypassing DR, when attacking anyone but self for 7 rd (DC 16 Will 1 rd)
Fire Of Vengeance (P4 Evoc): Target of next Smite Evil hit suffers 3d8 HP fire on first attack on anyone but self
Gravity Bow (R1 Tran): Self bow inflicts damage as if 1 size larger for 7 min
Hero's Defiance (P1 Conj): Expending Lay on Hands use on self when reduced to 0 or negative HP heals +1d6 HP
Holy Whisper (P3 Evoc): 30' cone sickens all evil creatures for 7 rd and inflicts 2d8 HP on outsiders, dragons, and undead (DC 16 Fort neg); also gives good creatures +2 attack and damage for 1 rd
Hunter's Howl (R1 Necr): Self gains +2 attack, damage, Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival vs. targets in 20' radius (favored enemies shaken instead) (DC 11 Will neg) for 7 rd
Instant Enemy (R3 Ench): R40' Self gains favored enemy benefits vs. target for 7 min
King's Castle (P4 Conj): R40' Self exchanges places w/target ally
Knight's Calling (P1 Ench): R40' Target must move to attack self (DC 14 Will neg) for 1 rd
Lead Blades (R1 Tran): Self melee weapons inflict damage as if 1 size larger for 7 min
Light Lance (P2 Evoc): Creates a glowing, good-aligned +1 lance that inflicts +2d6 HP vs. evil foes for 8 rd
Marks Of Forbiddance (P3 Abju): R40' Ally target and foe target cannot attack one another (DC 16 Will neg 1 rd) for 7 rd
Oath Of Peace (P4 Abju): Self gains +5 AC and saves and DR 10/evil for 7 rd or until attacks
Paladin's Sacrifice (P2 Abju): R40' Immediate damage and negative effects to target transferred to self
Protective Spirit (R2 Conj): Successful +20 attack by spirit negates 1 AOO/rd on self for 7 rd
Rally Point (P1 Ench): R5' Good creatures gain +2 attacks, +2 saves, and 14 temporary HP for 1 rd on first pass through 5' sq for 7 min
Residual Tracking (R1 Divi): Self has vision of creation of touched footprint
Sacrificial Oath (P4 Abju): Self may suffer damage and negative effects instead of touched target (refusal inflicts 15 HP on self) for 7 min
Stay The Hand (P4 Ench): 170' Target suffers negated attack (DC 17 Will -5 attack and damage) and -2 attack and damage on same creature for 7 rd
Veil Of Positive Energy (P1 Abju): Self gains +2 AC and +2 saves vs. undead for 70 min; dismissal inflicts 7 HP on undead in 5' radius
Venomous Bolt (R3 Necr): Fired arrow or bolt inflicts -1d3 Constitution/rd for 6 rd (DC 13 Fort neg)
Wake Of Light (P2 Evoc): 10'x120' trail behind mount makes difficult terrain normal for good creatures and normal terrain difficult for evil creatures for 7 rd
Magic Notes:
Charisma Channel Energy Adjustment: +3
Charisma Paladin Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level P1, P2, P3
Greater Elemental Focus (Acid): Increased Elemental Focus (Acid) effects
Channel Energy: R30' May heal or inflict 5d6 HP (DC 18 Will half) 6/dy
Channel Positive Energy: May expend 2 Lay On Hands uses to use Channel Energy effects
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Detect Evil: May use Detect Evil effects at will
Elemental Focus (Acid): +2 save DC on spells that inflict acid damage
Enlarge Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell range
Lay On Hands: May harm undead or heal 5d6 HP 8/dy
Mercy: Lay On Hands removes cursed, dazed, diseased
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Widen Spell: May use +3 spell slot to dbl chosen spell area of affect
